title: Justice (Theft and Fraud Offences) (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 2 of 2021) shall
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Criminal Justice (Theft and Fraud
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Criminal Justice (Theft and Fraud 

Offences) (Amendment) Act 2021 (Commencement) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited criminal justice (theft fraud offences) (amendment) act 2021 (commencement) order 2021

title: Justice (Theft and Fraud Offences) (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 2 of 2021) shall
heading: 2. The 14th day of April 2021 is appointed as the day on which the Criminal
text_raw:
2. The 14th day of April 2021 is appointed as the day on which the Criminal 
Justice (Theft and Fraud Offences) (Amendment) Act 2021 (No. 2 of 2021) shall 
come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

7 April, 2021. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 13th April, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [167] 3
